name: Brave the House 2023
description:
Brave the House is a top-down game where the player is placed in a haunted house maze and must navigate the maze to find the key to unlock the escape door in a time limit for each level, while evading enemies.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move

GAME DESIGN LEAD - LIAM K
ART AND SOUND DESIGN LEAD - MATEO F
GAME DIRECTOR/PRODUCER - EVAN L
TECH LEAD - JASON L
